item.title: Frontend Report July 2024

item.description: The report for July 2024 gives you a snapshot of what’s happening in the world of web development. React is evolving with Server Components, and Next.

item.title: Market Report July 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Key Takeaways Meta’s Llama 3.1, particularly the 405B parameter model, marks a significant advancement in open-source AI, competing with leading closed-source alternatives.

item.title: Vietnam Tech Ecosystem 2024 Report
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Current State of the Vietnam Tech Market Investment Total: $529 million, a 17% drop from 2022. Resilience: Vietnam’s VC funding fell 17%, compared to a global 35% drop.

item.title: Market Report May 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Key Takeaways GPT-4o’s new advancements can challenge many current businesses while making LLMs foundational for a new wave of software applications.

item.title: Echelon X Singapore 2024: Where Innovations Meet Inspiration
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This year’s Echelon X in Singapore was a bustling hub of innovation, bringing together around 10,000 participants, including 154 speakers, 50 TOP100 startups, investors, corporates, and government agencies from over 35 countries.

item.title: Market Report April 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Key Takeaways Meta’s Llama 3, Databricks’ DBRX, and Mixtral 8x22B are setting new standards in AI capabilities, offering high-quality options for self-hosted LLM applications.
